comments.comments_text: Trincao (Sporting Lisbon) perfectly wriggles his way through two or three opponents, and he produces a low drive from the edge of the box which goes inside the left post. Wonderful goal!

comments.comments_text: GOAL! Keeper Antonio Adan totally miss kicks his clearance straight to Alexis Sanchez (Marseille), who rifles the ball back into the net from close range. It’s now 1:1.
